patient_info: Abnormality of refraction,Visual loss,Cafe-au-lait spot,Cranial hyperostosis,Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins,Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia,Abnormal shape of the occiput
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. Aniridia - a rare condition characterized by the absence of an iris (the colored part of the eye) and typically accompanied by other eye defects and brain abnormalities.
2. Congenital cataract - a clouding of the lens in the eye that is present at birth
3. Congenital aphakia - a condition in which the child is born with a lack of hearing
4. Macroglossia - an enlarged tongue
5. Cleft palate - a common condition in which the lip and/or palate do not form properly during fetal development
6. Post-palatal cleft - a rare condition in which a cleft is present in the area behind the tongue
7. Lens luxation - a condition in which the lens is dislodged from its proper position in the eye
8. Scoliosis - an abnormal curvature of the spine
9. Thickened scalp - a condition in which the scalp is thickened and possibly itchy
10. Hyperostosis - an abnormal thickening of the bone or cartilage in the skull or spine.
